verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

עֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> Make לְךָ֗ שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> thee two חֲצֽוֹצְרֹ֣ת <WH2689> trumpets כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> of silver מִקְשָׁ֖ה <WH4749> of a whole piece תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> shalt thou make אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> them that thou mayest use לְךָ֙ לְמִקְרָ֣א <WH4744> them for the calling הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> of the assembly וּלְמַסַּ֖ע <WH4550> and for the journeying אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמַּחֲנֽוֹת׃ <WH4264> of the camps

וְתָקְע֖וּ <WH8628> And when they shall blow בָּהֵ֑ן וְנֽוֹעֲד֤וּ <WH3259> shall assemble אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> all the assembly אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> themselves to thee at the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְאִם־ <WH518> if בְּאַחַ֖ת <WH259> [but] with one יִתְקָ֑עוּ <WH8628> And if they blow וְנוֹעֲד֤וּ <WH3259> shall gather אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> before הַנְּשִׂיאִ֔ים <WH5387> [trumpet] then the princes רָאשֵׁ֖י <WH7218> [which are] heads אַלְפֵ֥י <WH505> of the thousands יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וּתְקַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8628> When ye blow תְּרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> an alarm וְנָֽסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> shall go forward הַֽמַּחֲנ֔וֹת <WH4264> then the camps הַחֹנִ֖ים <WH2583> that lie קֵֽדְמָה׃ <WH6924> on the east parts

וּתְקַעְתֶּ֤ם <WH8628> When ye blow תְּרוּעָה֙ <WH8643> an alarm שֵׁנִ֔ית <WH8145> the second time וְנָֽסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> shall take their journey הַֽמַּחֲנ֔וֹת <WH4264> then the camps הַחֹנִ֖ים <WH2583> that lie תֵּימָ֑נָה <WH8486> on the south side תְּרוּעָ֥ה <WH8643> an alarm יִתְקְע֖וּ <WH8628> they shall blow לְמַסְעֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4550> for their journeys

וּבְהַקְהִ֖יל <WH6950> is to be gathered together אֶת־ <WH853> הַקָּהָ֑ל <WH6951> But when the congregation תִּתְקְע֖וּ <WH8628> ye shall blow וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> without תָרִֽיעוּ׃ <WH7321> but ye shall not sound an alarm

וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> And the sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests יִתְקְע֖וּ <WH8628> shall blow בַּֽחֲצֹצְר֑וֹת <WH2689> with the trumpets וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become לָכֶ֛ם לְחֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> and they shall be to you for an ordinance עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1755> throughout your generations

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> When תָבֹ֨אוּ <WH935> And if ye go מִלְחָמָ֜ה <WH4421> to war בְּאַרְצְכֶ֗ם <WH776> in your land עַל־ <WH5921> against הַצַּר֙ <WH6862> against הַצֹּרֵ֣ר <WH6887> the enemy that oppresseth אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וַהֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <WH7321> you then ye shall blow an alarm בַּחֲצֹצְר֑וֹת <WH2689> with the trumpets וֲנִזְכַּרְתֶּ֗ם <WH2142> and ye shall be remembered לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God וְנוֹשַׁעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3467> and ye shall be saved מֵאֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH341> from your enemies

וּבְי֨וֹם <WH3117> Also in the day שִׂמְחַתְכֶ֥ם <WH8057> of your gladness וּֽבְמוֹעֲדֵיכֶם֮ <WH4150> and in your solemn days וּבְרָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> and in the beginnings חָדְשֵׁיכֶם֒ <WH2320> of your months וּתְקַעְתֶּ֣ם <WH8628> ye shall blow בַּחֲצֹֽצְרֹ֗ת <WH2689> with the trumpets עַ֚ל <WH5921> over עֹלֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5930> over your burnt offerings וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and over זִבְחֵ֣י <WH2077> and over the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵיכֶ֑ם <WH8002> of your peace offerings וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> become לָכֶ֤ם לְזִכָּרוֹן֙ <WH2146> that they may be to you for a memorial לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God פ

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become בַּשָּׁנָ֧ה <WH8141> year הַשֵּׁנִ֛ית <WH8145> [day] of the second בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <WH8145> in the second בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> And it came to pass on the twentieth בַּחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month נַעֲלָה֙ <WH5927> was taken up הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <WH6051> that the cloud מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> over מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <WH4908> from off the tabernacle הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <WH5715> of the testimony

וַיִּסְע֧וּ <WH5265> took בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4550> their journeys מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> out of the wilderness סִינָ֑י <WH5514> of Sinai וַיִּשְׁכֹּ֥ן <WH7931> rested הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> and the cloud בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> in the wilderness פָּארָֽן׃ <WH6290> of Paran

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> took their journey בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> And they first עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֥י <WH6310> according to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> of Moses

וַיִּסַּ֞ע <WH5265> [place] went דֶּ֣גֶל <WH1714> the standard מַחֲנֵ֧ה <WH4264> of the camp בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of Judah בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> In the first לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> according to their armies וְעַל־ <WH5921> over צְבָא֔וֹ <WH6635> army נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <WH5177> and over his host [was] Nahshon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <WH5992> of Amminadab

וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשָׂשכָ֑ר <WH3485> of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <WH5417> [was] Nethaneel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צוּעָֽר׃ <WH6686> of Zuar

וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children זְבוּלֻ֑ן <WH2074> of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <WH446> [was] Eliab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֵלֽוֹן׃ <WH2497> of Helon

וְהוּרַ֖ד <WH3381> was taken down הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> And the tabernacle וְנָסְע֤וּ <WH5265> set forward בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> and the sons גֵרְשׁוֹן֙ <WH1648> of Gershon וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the sons מְרָרִ֔י <WH4847> of Merari נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <WH5375> bearing הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> the tabernacle ס

וְנָסַ֗ע <WH5265> set forward דֶּ֛גֶל <WH1714> And the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> of the camp רְאוּבֵ֖ן <WH7205> of Reuben לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> according to their armies וְעַל־ <WH5921> according צְבָא֔וֹ <WH6635> and over his host אֱלִיצ֖וּר <WH468> [was] Elizur בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <WH7707> of Shedeur

וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children שִׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon שְׁלֻֽמִיאֵ֖ל <WH8017> [was] Shelumiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צוּרִֽי שַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH6701> of Zurishaddai

וְעַל־ <WH5921> was over צְבָ֖א <WH6635> And over the host מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children גָ֑ד <WH1410> of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <WH460> [was] Eliasaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son דְּעוּאֵֽל׃ <WH1845> of Deuel

וְנָסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> set forward הַקְּהָתִ֔ים <WH6956> And the Kohathites נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <WH5375> bearing הַמִּקְדָּ֑שׁ <WH4720> the sanctuary וְהֵקִ֥ימוּ <WH6965> and [the other] did set up אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> the tabernacle עַד־ <WH5704> before בֹּאָֽם׃ <WH935> against they came ס

וְנָסַ֗ע <WH5265> set forward דֶּ֛גֶל <WH1714> And the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> of the camp בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> of Ephraim לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> according to their armies וְעַל־ <WH5921> over צְבָא֔וֹ <WH6635> and over his host אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <WH476> [was] Elishama בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <WH5989> of Ammihud

וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> of Manasseh גַּמְלִיאֵ֖ל <WH1583> [was] Gamaliel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פְּדָה־ <WH6301> of Pedahzur צֽוּר׃ <WH6301> of Pedahzur

וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin אֲבִידָ֖ן <WH27> [was] Abidan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גִּדְעוֹנִֽי׃ <WH1441> of Gideoni ס

וְנָסַ֗ע <WH5265> set forward דֶּ֚גֶל <WH1714> And the standard מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> of the camp בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children דָ֔ן <WH1835> of Dan מְאַסֵּ֥ף <WH622> [which was] the rereward לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הַֽמַּחֲנֹ֖ת <WH4264> of all the camps לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> throughout their hosts וְעַל־ <WH5921> over צְבָא֔וֹ <WH6635> and over his host אֲחִיעֶ֖זֶר <WH295> [was] Ahiezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּישַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH5996> of Ammishaddai

וְעַל־ <WH5921> over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children אָשֵׁ֑ר <WH836> of Asher פַּגְעִיאֵ֖ל <WH6295> [was] Pagiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עָכְרָֽן׃ <WH5918> of Ocran

וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children נַפְתָּלִ֑י <WH5321> of Naphtali אֲחִירַ֖ע <WH299> [was] Ahira בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֵינָֽן׃ <WH5881> of Enan

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> Thus [were] מַסְעֵ֥י <WH4550> the journeyings בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> according to their armies וַיִּסָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> when they set forward ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses לְ֠חֹבָב <WH2246> unto Hobab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רְעוּאֵ֣ל <WH7467> of Raguel הַמִּדְיָנִי֮ <WH4084> the Midianite חֹתֵ֣ן <WH2859> father in law מֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> Moses' נֹסְעִ֣ים ׀ <WH5265> We are journeying אֲנַ֗חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> unto the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of which אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of which the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> I will give לָכֶ֑ם לְכָ֤ה <WH1980> come אִתָּ֙נוּ֙ <WH854> and we וְהֵטַ֣בְנוּ <WH3190> will do לָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for the LORD דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> hath spoken ט֖וֹב <WH2896> good עַל־ <WH5921> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> concerning Israel

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֵלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> come כִּ֧י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo אֶל־ <WH413> to אַרְצִ֛י <WH776> to mine own land וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to מוֹלַדְתִּ֖י <WH4138> and to my kindred אֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> will go

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said אַל־ <WH408> nay נָ֖א <WH4994> Please תַּעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> Leave אֹתָ֑נוּ <WH853> כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> after that יָדַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> know חֲנֹתֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH2583> how we are to encamp בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וְהָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> become לָּ֖נוּ לְעֵינָֽיִם׃ <WH5869> and thou mayest be to us instead of eyes

וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become כִּי־ <WH3588> will be if תֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> go עִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> with וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> become הַטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> with us yea it shall be that what goodness הַה֗וּא <WH1931> that אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whatever יֵיטִ֧יב <WH3190> shall do יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD עִמָּ֖נוּ <WH5973> we וְהֵטַ֥בְנוּ <WH3190> will do לָֽךְ׃

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> And they departed מֵהַ֣ר <WH2022> from the mount יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> journey שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> three יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days' וַאֲר֨וֹן <WH727> and the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD נֹסֵ֣עַ <WH5265> went לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6440> before דֶּ֚רֶךְ <WH1870> journey שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> them in the three יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days' לָת֥וּר <WH8446> to search out לָהֶ֖ם מְנוּחָֽה׃ <WH4496> a resting place

וַעֲנַ֧ן <WH6051> And the cloud יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> was over יוֹמָ֑ם <WH3119> [was] upon them by day בְּנָסְעָ֖ם <WH5265> when they went out מִן־ <WH4480> from הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> of the camp ׆ ס

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> came בִּנְסֹ֥עַ <WH5265> set forward הָאָרֹ֖ן <WH727> And it came to pass when the ark וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> that Moses קוּמָ֣ה ׀ <WH6965> Rise up יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> LORD וְיָפֻ֙צוּ֙ <WH6327> be scattered אֹֽיְבֶ֔יךָ <WH341> and let thine enemies וְיָנֻ֥סוּ <WH5127> thee flee מְשַׂנְאֶ֖יךָ <WH8130> and let them that hate מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> before
